turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can do that for you. what did u want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order four large pizzas. So, I'd like to have a a a one with pepperoni and black olives, one with pepperoni and Italian sausage, one with pepperoni and banana peppers, and one with just cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And And all of them If you could have all of them have extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of crust did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just hand tossed, and they should all be large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: u said 4 large pizzas, 1 with pepperoni and black olives, 1 with pepperoni and italian sausage, 1 with pepperoni and banana peppers, and 1 with cheese. all with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Yeah, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for the order is $68.99.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. i've placed the order. it'll b ready for you to pick it up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care! enjoy those pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will. Thank you.
